db.data: 2018;LEFT SINGLE QUOTATION MARK;Pi;0;ON;;;;;N;SINGLE TURNED COMMA QUOTATION MARK;;;;;;;567;1.1

desc.data: ¶= single turned comma quotation mark¶• this is the preferred character (as opposed to 201B)¶→ (apostrophe - 0027)¶→ (modifier letter turned comma - 02BB)¶→ (heavy single turned comma quotation mark ornament - 275B)
